txt.en: Defeat many giants in the Misty Mountains.
Defeat giants in the Misty Mountains

Since you first laid eyes upon these huge creatures as they stepped towards you through the driving snow, you have become something of an old hand at fighting them. Their size can be used against them, and their brains have definitely given way to brawn. Nevertheless, you know that the day you become careless or complacent is the day you will find yourself being pounded feet-first into a frozen grave.
